Text: If like me you think black girls are the best, you're probably going to love this. IMO, the girls are fabulous! I haven't finished watching, but so far everyone really seem horny (I'm sure it's just an act, but it's believeable) and like they're enjoying themselves, a quality I find lacking in most movies. (While I can complain about it, why don't all the producers of porn edit out stuff like guys losing their hard-on? It doesn't exactly add to the illusion.)
